fr.ecp.IS1220.group5.project

Class MyFoodoraSystem

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.ecp.IS1220.group5.project.MyFoodoraSystem
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MyFoodoraSystemGUI

    public class MyFoodoraSystem
extends java.lang.Object
    MyFoodoraSystem is the class managing the whole system.

    This class stores:

    • The registered users (managers, restaurants, customers and couriers)
    • The history of completed orders
    • Profit-related information
    Version:
    2.0
    Author:
    alexandre01, dennis101251

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      java.math.BigDecimal delivery_cost_price
      the price of delivery per kilometer which the system should pay for the courier
      java.math.BigDecimal markup_percentage
      The ratio of markup of the order price
      java.math.BigDecimal service_fee
      The fixed service fee that adds to the order price

        public void showOrder()

        See Also:

      • endOrder

        public void endOrder()
              throws UserNotFoundException
        Ends an customer's order, applies the fidelity program and send the order to the restaurant.
        • apply the fidelity program
        • send the order to the restaurant
        • save the order to
        • save the order to the history of system
        • delegate this order to an available courier
        • save the order to the history of the customer
        • clean the current order
        Throws:
        UserNotFoundException

      • showHistoryOfOrder_Customer

        public void showHistoryOfOrder_Customer()
        Shows the complete customer's history of orders. Only for customers.

        public void showFidelityCard()

      • setNotified

        public void setNotified(java.lang.String string)
        Changes the notification status of a customer.
        • On: to receive messages from MyFooddora
        • Off: to disable notifications.
        Parameters:
        string - "on" if the customer wants to be notified, "off" if he doesn't.
